overview: Jean-Yves Le Castel interviews Debbie van Gils for a job behind the counter at a pastry shop. He uses a very thin excuse to get her to strip and has sex with her. Meanwhile his wife, Elodie Cherie, is cheating on him with Eric Weiss. Then Tom O'Connors, the baker, has sex with Barbie Est in the back.  This continues until everyone has screwed everyone at the bakery. Finally Elodie is caught cheating and ends up taking both her husbands and her lovers cock at once in a DP scene.
title: Bakers Dirty Dozen
